name: NTVBangladeshOnline
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
NTV is a bilingual satellite television channel based in Bangladesh. It started operation in 2003. It is one of the most popular Bengali TV channels in the country. 

This Alexa skill will aggregate the latest news updates from NTV portal.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
